history.proof: intros. induction n. - unfold sum_n. qsimpl time: 2 use: sum_O. qsimpl time: 2 use: mult_one_l,sum_O. + shelve. + shelve. + shelve. -

exceptions.exn: The LHS of sum_O (sum_n _ 0) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of mult_one_l (mult one _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : Ring a : K u : nat -> K H : forall a0 : nat -> ?G, sum_n a0 0 = a0 0%nat H1 : forall a0 : nat -> ?G0, sum_n a0 0 = a0 0%nat H0 : forall x : K, mult one x = x Unable to unify "mult (sum_n_m u 0 0) a" with "sum_n_m (fun k : nat => mult (u k) a) 0 0".

In environment K : Ring a : K u : nat -> K n : nat IHn : sum_n (fun k : nat => mult (u k) a) n = mult (sum_n u n) a H1 : forall (a0 : nat -> ?G2) (n0 : nat), sum_n a0 (S n0) = plus (sum_n a0 n0) (a0 (S n0)) H0 : forall a0 : nat -> ?G1, sum_n a0 0 = a0 0%nat H : forall x : K, mult one x = x H4 : forall (a0 : nat -> ?G4) (n0 : nat), sum_n a0 (S n0) = plus (sum_n a0 n0) (a0 (S n0)) H3 : forall a0 : nat -> ?G3, sum_n a0 0 = a0 0%nat H6 : forall (a0 : nat -> ?G6) (n0 : nat), sum_n a0 (S n0) = plus (sum_n a0 n0) (a0 (S n0)) H5 : forall a0 : nat -> ?G5, sum_n a0 0 = a0 0%nat Unable to unify "mult (sum_n_m u 0 (S n)) a" with "sum_n_m (fun k : nat => mult (u k) a) 0 (S n)".

original: intros K a u n. induction n. - simpl. unfold sum_n. simpl. rewrite sum_O. rewrite mult_one_l. reflexivity. - simpl. unfold sum_n. simpl. rewrite sum_Sn. rewrite IHn. rewrite sum_Sn. reflexivity.
